item.name: Dynamic Product Filtering (Examples)
item.description: All requests in this folder are EXAMPLES. The /products/filter endpoint supports fully dynamic filtering: you can combine any supported filter as query parameters (category, wardrobe-section, color, size, discounted, search, minPrice, maxPrice, inStock, sort, limit, etc.). Mix and match as needed! Filtering is dynamic and replaces all previous product listing/search endpoints.

request.description: Filter products dynamically by category, discount, sort, and limit. You can add any supported filter as a query parameter.

Create a new order.

- 'total' is calculated server-side as the sum of all item prices (price Ã— quantity), applying product-level discounts automatically.
- Each product's discount is applied before the order-level discount.
- 'discount' is a percentage (e.g. 10 for 10% off the subtotal after product discounts).
- 'delivery' is calculated automatically by the backend: it is 30 by default, but free if the order total is at least 500.
- 'customer_info.email' is required.
- Optional fields include: payment_method, shipping_method, notes, is_guest.
If email is missing, returns: { "error": "Customer email is required for orders" }
